pli-tv-pvr5:0.3: 1. The section with a succession on legal issues
pli-tv-pvr5:1.1: (1) In regard to a legal issue arising from a dispute:
pli-tv-pvr5:1.8: In how many ways does one dispute?
pli-tv-pvr5:1.9: In how many ways is a legal issue arising from a dispute settled?
pli-tv-pvr5:2.1: (2) In regard to a legal issue arising from an accusation:
pli-tv-pvr5:2.8: In how many ways does one accuse?
pli-tv-pvr5:2.9: In how many ways is a legal issue arising from an accusation settled?
pli-tv-pvr5:3.1: (3) In regard to a legal issue arising from an offense:
pli-tv-pvr5:3.8: In how many ways does one commit an offense?
pli-tv-pvr5:3.9: In how many ways is a legal issue arising from an offense settled?
pli-tv-pvr5:4.1: (4) In regard to a legal issue arising from business:
pli-tv-pvr5:4.8: In how many ways does one give rise to business?
pli-tv-pvr5:4.9: In how many ways is a legal issue arising from business settled?
pli-tv-pvr5:5.1: (1) “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from disputes?”
pli-tv-pvr5:5.2: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.11: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.14: “In how many ways does one dispute?”
pli-tv-pvr5:5.16: with a view that accords with the Teaching, or with a view that is contrary to the Teaching.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.17: “In how many ways is a legal issue arising from a dispute settled?”
pli-tv-pvr5:5.19: by resolution face-to-face and by majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.1: (2) “What is the forerunner of legal issues arsing from accusations?”
pli-tv-pvr5:6.2: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.11: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.14: “In how many ways does one accuse?”
pli-tv-pvr5:6.16: based on action or based on offense.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.17: “In how many ways is a legal issue arising from an accusation settled?”
pli-tv-pvr5:6.19: by resolution face-to-face, by resolution through recollection, by resolution because of past insanity, and by further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.1: (3) “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from offenses?”
pli-tv-pvr5:7.2: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.11: three unwholesome causes and three indeterminate causes.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.14: “In how many ways does one commit an offense?”
pli-tv-pvr5:7.16: through shamelessness, through ignorance, through being overcome by anxiety, through perceiving what is unallowable as allowable, through perceiving what is allowable as unallowable, through absentmindedness.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.17: “In how many ways is a legal issue arising from an offense settled?”
pli-tv-pvr5:7.19: by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted, and by resolution face-to-face and by covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.1: (4) “What is the forerunner of  legal issues arising from business?”
pli-tv-pvr5:8.2: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.11: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.15: “In how many ways does one give rise to business?”
pli-tv-pvr5:8.17: through a motion or though getting permission.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.18: “In how many ways is a legal issue arising from business settled?”
pli-tv-pvr5:9.1: How many ways of settling are there?
pli-tv-pvr5:9.3: resolution face-to-face; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; majority decision; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:10.1: With a different presentation, might the seven ways of settling become ten, and the ten ways become seven?
pli-tv-pvr5:11.2: A legal issue arising from a dispute is settled in two ways, a legal issue arising from an accusation is settled in four ways, a legal issue arising from an offense is settled in three ways, a legal issue arising from business is settled in one way.
pli-tv-pvr5:11.3: In this way, the seven ways of settling become ten, and the ten ways become seven.
pli-tv-pvr5:12.1: The sixth section on “a different presentation” is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:13.1: How many of the ways of settling legal issues arising from disputes do the monks and the nuns have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.2: How many do they not have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.3: How many of the ways of settling legal issues arising from accusations do the monks and the nuns have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.4: How many do they not have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.5: How many of the ways of settling legal issues arising from offenses do the monks and the nuns have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.6: How many do they not have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.7: How many of the ways of settling legal issue arising from business do the monks and the nuns have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:13.8: How many do they not have in common?
pli-tv-pvr5:14.1: (1) They have two ways of settling legal issues arising from disputes in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:14.3: And they have five not in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:14.4: resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:15.1: (2) They have four ways of settling legal issues arising from accusations in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:15.2: resolution face-to-face; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:15.4: And they have three not in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:15.5: majority decision; acting according to what has been admitted; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:16.1: (3) They have three ways of settling legal issues arising from offenses in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:16.2: resolution face-to-face; acting according to what has been admitted; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:16.3: And they have three not in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:16.4: majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:17.1: (4) They have one ways of settling legal issues arising from business in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:17.3: And they have six not in common:
pli-tv-pvr5:17.4: majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:18.1: The seventh section on “in common” is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:19.1: How many ways of settling are there that belong with legal issues arising from disputes?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.2: How many belong with something else?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.3: How many ways of settling are there that belong with legal issues arising from accusations?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.4: How many belong with something else?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.5: How many ways of settling are there that belong with legal issues arising from offenses?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.6: How many belong with something else?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.7: How many ways of settling are there that belong with legal issues arising from business?
pli-tv-pvr5:19.8: How many belong with something else?
pli-tv-pvr5:20.1: (1) There are two ways of settling that belong with legal issues arising from disputes:
pli-tv-pvr5:20.3: And there are five that belong with something else:
pli-tv-pvr5:20.4: resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:21.1: (2) There are two ways of settling that belong with legal issues arising from accusations:
pli-tv-pvr5:21.2: resolution face-to-face; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:21.3: And there are three that belong with something else:
pli-tv-pvr5:21.4: majority decision; acting according to what has been admitted; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:22.1: (3) There are two ways of settling that belong with legal issues arising from offenses:
pli-tv-pvr5:22.2: resolution face-to-face; acting according to what has been admitted; covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:22.3: And there are four that belong with something else:
pli-tv-pvr5:22.4: majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:23.1: (4) There are two ways of settling that belong with legal issues arising from business:
pli-tv-pvr5:23.3: And there are six that belong with something else:
pli-tv-pvr5:23.4: the decision of the majority, a verdict of innocence, a verdict of past insanity, the carrying out on (his) acknowledgement, a decision for specific depravity, a covering over (as) with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:24.1: The eighth section on “belonging to that” is finished
pli-tv-pvr5:25.0: 4. The section on different ways of settling used in common
pli-tv-pvr5:25.1: One way of settling used in common with another way of settling; one way of settling not used in common with another way of settling.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.2: It may be that one way of settling is in common with another way of settling; it may be that one way of settling is not in common with another way of settling.
pli-tv-pvr5:26.1: How may it be that one way of settling is used in common with another way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:26.2: How may it be that one way of settling is not used in common with another way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:26.3: (1) Majority decision is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; and covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:27.1: (2) Resolution through recollection is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; and majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:28.1: (3) Resolution because of past insanity is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; and resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:29.1: (4) Acting according to what has been admitted is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; resolution through recollection; and resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:30.1: (5) Further penalty is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; and acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:31.1: (6) Covering over, as if with grass is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; and further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:33.1: The ninth section on different ways of settling used in common is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.0: 5. The section on different ways of settling belonging with each other
pli-tv-pvr5:34.1: One way of settling belongs with another way of settling; one way of settling does not belong with another way of settling.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.2: It may be that one way of settling belongs with another way of settling; it may be that one way of settling does not belong with another way of settling.
pli-tv-pvr5:35.1: How may it be that one way of settling belongs with another way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:35.2: How may it be that one way of settling does not belong with another way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:35.3: (1) Majority decision belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; and covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:36.1: (2) Resolution through recollection belong with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; and majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:37.1: (3) Resolution because of past insanity belong with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; and resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:38.1: (4) Acting according to what has been admitted belong with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; resolution through recollection; and resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:39.1: (5) Further penalty belong with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with covering over, as if with grass; majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; and acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:40.1: (6) Covering over, as if with grass belong with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; and further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:42.1: The tenth section on different ways of settling belonging with each other is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:43.0: 6. The section on “a way of settling is resolution face-to-face”
pli-tv-pvr5:43.1: Is one way of settling resolution face-to-face, and is resolution face-to-face one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.2: Is one way of settling a majority decision, and is a majority decision one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.3: Is one way of settling resolution through recollection, and is resolution through recollection one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.4: Is one way of settling resolution because of past insanity, and is resolution because of past insanity one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.5: Is one way of settling acting according to what has been admitted, and is acting according to what has been admitted one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.6: Is one way of settling a further penalty, and is a further penalty one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:43.7: Is one way of settling covering over, as if with grass, and is covering over, as if with grass, one way of settling?
pli-tv-pvr5:44.1: (1) Majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass:
pli-tv-pvr5:44.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:44.3: Resolution face-to-face is both a way of settling and also resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:45.1: (2) Resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; resolution face-to-face:
pli-tv-pvr5:45.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:45.3: A majority decision is both a way of settling and also a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:46.1: (3) Resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; resolution face-to-face; majority decision:
pli-tv-pvr5:46.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:46.3: Resolution through recollection is both a way of settling and also resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:47.1: (4) Acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; resolution face-to-face; majority decision; resolution through recollection:
pli-tv-pvr5:47.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:47.3: Resolution because of past insanity is both a way of settling and also resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:48.1: (5) Further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; resolution face-to-face; majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity:
pli-tv-pvr5:48.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:48.3: Acting according to what has been admitted is both a way of settling and also acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:49.1: (6) Covering over, as if with grass; resolution face-to-face; majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted:
pli-tv-pvr5:49.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:49.3: A further penalty is both a way of settling and also a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:50.1: (7) Resolution face-to-face; majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; further penalty:
pli-tv-pvr5:50.2: these ways of settling are ways of settling, but they are not covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:50.3: Covering over, as if with grass, is both a way of settling and also covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:51.1: The eleventh section on “a way of settling is resolution face-to-face” is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:52.1: Is one way of resolution resolution face-to-face, and is resolution face-to-face one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.2: Is one way of resolution a majority decision, and is a majority decision one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.3: Is one way of resolution resolution through recollection, and is resolution through recollection one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.4: Is one way of resolution resolution because of past insanity, and is resolution because of past insanity one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.5: Is one way of resolution acting according to what has been admitted, and is acting according to what has been admitted one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.6: Is one way of resolution a further penalty, and is a further penalty one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:52.7: Is one way of resolution covering over, as if with grass, and is covering over, as if with grass, one way of resolution?
pli-tv-pvr5:53.1: (1) A resolution may be resolution face-to-face, or it may not be resolution face-to -face.
pli-tv-pvr5:53.2: Resolution face-to-face is both a resolution and also a resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:54.1: (2) A resolution may be a majority decision, or it may not be a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:54.2: a majority decision is both a resolution and also a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:55.1: (3) A resolution may be resolution through recollection, or it may not be resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:55.2: Resolution through recollection is both a resolution and also a resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:56.1: (4) A resolution may be resolution because of past insanity, or it may not be resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:56.2: Resolution because of past insanity is both a resolution and also a resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:57.1: (5) A resolution may be acting according to what has been admitted, or it may not be acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:57.2: Acting according to what has been admitted is both a resolution and also an acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:58.1: (6) A resolution may be a further penalty, or it may not be a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:58.2: A further penalty is both a resolution and also a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:59.1: (7) A resolution may be covering over, as if with grass, or it may not be covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:59.2: Covering over, as if with grass, is both a resolution and also a covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:60.1: The twelfth section on resolution is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:61.1: Is resolution face-to-face wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.2: Is a majority decision wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.3: Is resolution through recollection wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.4: Is resolution because of past insanity wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.5: Is acting according to what has been admitted wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.6: Is a further penalty wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:61.7: Is covering over, as if with grass, wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:62.1: (1) Resolution face-to-face may be wholesome or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:63.1: (2) A majority decision may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:64.1: (3) Resolution through recollection may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:65.1: (4) Resolution because of past insanity may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:66.1: (5) Acting according to what has been admitted may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:67.1: (6) A further penalty may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:68.1: (7) Covering over, as if with grass, may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:69.1: Is a legal issue arising from a dispute wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:69.2: Is a legal issue arising from an accusation wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:69.3: Is a legal issue arising from an offense wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:69.4: Is a legal issues arising from business wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
pli-tv-pvr5:70.1: (1) A legal issue arising from a dispute may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:71.1: (2) A legal issue arising from an accusation may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:72.1: (3) A legal issue arising from an accusation may be unwholesome or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:72.2: A legal issue arising from an accusation is never wholesome.
pli-tv-pvr5:73.1: (4) A legal issue arising from business may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
pli-tv-pvr5:74.1: The thirteenth section on the wholesome is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.0: 9. The section on “where”, the section on questioning
pli-tv-pvr5:75.1: (1) Where a majority decision is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there a majority decision is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.3: But there resolution through recollection is not appropriate; nor is resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; a further penalty; or covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.1: (2) Where resolution through recollection is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there resolution through recollection is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.3: But there resolution because of past insanity is not appropriate; nor is acting according to what has been admitted; a further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; or a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.1: (3) Where resolution because of past insanity is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there resolution because of past insanity is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.3: But there acting according to what has been admitted is not appropriate; nor a further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; a majority decision; or resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.1: (4) Where acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.3: But there a further penalty is not appropriate; nor is covering over, as if with grass; a majority decision; resolution through recollection; or resolution because of past insanity.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.1: (5) Where a further penalty is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there a further penalty is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.3: But there covering over, as if with grass, is not appropriate; nor a majority decision; resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity, or acting according to what has been admitted.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.1: (6) Where covering over, as if with grass, is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.2: Where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there covering over, as if with grass, is appropriate.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.3: But there a majority decision is not obtained; nor is resolution through recollection; resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted; or a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:81.1: (7) Where there is a majority decision, there is also resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:81.2: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is also a majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:81.3: But there resolution through recollection is not obtained; nor is resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; a further penalty; or covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.1: (8) Where there is resolution through recollection, there is also resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.2: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is also resolution through recollection.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.3: But there resolution because of past insanity is not obtained; nor is acting according to what has been admitted; a further penalty; covering over, as if with grass; or majority decision.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.4: Resolution face-to-face to be done as the basis …
pli-tv-pvr5:83.1: (9) Where there is covering over, as if with grass, there is also resolution face-to-face.
pli-tv-pvr5:83.2: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is also covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:83.3: But there a majority decision is not obtained; nor is resolution because of past insanity; acting according to what has been admitted; or a further penalty.
pli-tv-pvr5:84.2: The fourteenth section on “where” is finished.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.0: 10. The section on settling, the section on responding
pli-tv-pvr5:85.1: On that occasion when a legal question is settled by a verdict in the presence of and by a decision of the majority, where a decision of the majority is possible there a verdict in the presence of is possible; where a verdict in the presence of is possible there a decision of the majority is possible.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.2: Not possible there is a verdict of innocence … a covering over (as) with grass.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.1: On that occasion when a legal question is settled by a verdict in the presence of and by a verdict of innocence, where …
pli-tv-pvr5:90.1: On that occasion when a legal question is settled by a verdict in the presence of and by a covering over (as) with grass, where a covering over (as) with grass is possible there a verdict in the presence of is possible; where a verdict in the presence of is possible there a covering over (as) with grass is possible.
pli-tv-pvr5:90.2: Not possible there is a decision of the majority, not possible there is a verdict of innocence … not possible there is a decision for specific depravity.
pli-tv-pvr5:91.1: Concluded is the Fifteenth Chapter: on Occasion
pli-tv-pvr5:92.1: “Legal question” or “deciding”—are these things associated or dissociated,
pli-tv-pvr5:92.2: and is it possible, having analysed these things again and again, to point to a difference between them?
pli-tv-pvr5:93.1: “Legal question” or “deciding”—these things are dissociated, not associated,
pli-tv-pvr5:93.2: and it is possible to point to a difference between them—
pli-tv-pvr5:93.3: this should certainly not be said.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.5: “Legal question” or “deciding”—these things are associated, not dissociated,
pli-tv-pvr5:93.6: and it is not possible, having analysed these things again and again, to point to a difference between them.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.7: What is the reason for this?
pli-tv-pvr5:93.8: Was it not said by the Lord:
pli-tv-pvr5:93.9: “There are, monks, these four legal questions and seven decidings.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.10: Legal questions are settled by decidings; decidings are settled by legal questions.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.11: Thus these things are associated, not dissociated,
pli-tv-pvr5:93.12: and it is not possible … to point to a difference between them.”
